meanings.sent1: The subtlest hint of a smile crossed her face.
meanings.sent2: She wore the subtlest shade of blue on her dress.
meanings.sent3: The detective found the subtlest clue hidden in the corner.
meanings.sent4: His words carried the subtlest touch of sarcasm.
meanings.sent5: In the dim light, the subtlest movement caught her attention.

meanings.sent1: The painting displayed the subtlest blend of colors.
meanings.sent2: Her perfume had the subtlest floral scent.
meanings.sent3: The joke had a subtlest twist that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The music had the subtlest rhythm that soothed the soul.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with the subtlest hues of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: Making use of clever and indirect methods to achieve something.
meanings.sent1: He devised the subtlest plan to outsmart his opponent.
meanings.sent2: Her argument was filled with the subtlest persuasion.
meanings.sent3: The magician amazed the audience with his subtlest tricks.
meanings.sent4: The subtlest manipulation of facts led to his success.
meanings.sent5: The subtlest maneuver secured their victory in the game.
